de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction

Interface NumberVectorDistanceFunction<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - vector type, usually NumberVector or a parent type
    All Superinterfaces:
    DistanceFunction<O>, PrimitiveDistanceFunction<O>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    WeightedNumberVectorDistanceFunction<V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsolutePearsonCorrelationDistanceFunction, AbsoluteUncenteredCorrelationDistanceFunction, AbstractEditDistanceFunction, AbstractNumberVectorDistanceFunction, AbstractNumberVectorNorm, AbstractSpatialDistanceFunction, AbstractSpatialNorm, ArcCosineDistanceFunction, BrayCurtisDistanceFunction, CanberraDistanceFunction, ChiSquaredDistanceFunction, ClarkDistanceFunction, CosineDistanceFunction, DerivativeDTWDistanceFunction, DimensionSelectingLatLngDistanceFunction, DTWDistanceFunction, EDRDistanceFunction, ERPDistanceFunction, EuclideanDistanceFunction, HammingDistanceFunction, HellingerDistanceFunction, HistogramIntersectionDistanceFunction, HistogramMatchDistanceFunction, HSBHistogramQuadraticDistanceFunction, JaccardSimilarityDistanceFunction, JeffreyDivergenceDistanceFunction, JensenShannonDivergenceDistanceFunction, KolmogorovSmirnovDistanceFunction, Kulczynski1DistanceFunction, KullbackLeiblerDivergenceAsymmetricDistanceFunction, KullbackLeiblerDivergenceReverseAsymmetricDistanceFunction, LatLngDistanceFunction, LCSSDistanceFunction, LngLatDistanceFunction, LorentzianDistanceFunction, LPIntegerNormDistanceFunction, LPNormDistanceFunction, ManhattanDistanceFunction, MatrixWeightedDistanceFunction, MaximumDistanceFunction, MinimumDistanceFunction, OnedimensionalDistanceFunction, PearsonCorrelationDistanceFunction, RGBHistogramQuadraticDistanceFunction, SqrtJensenShannonDivergenceDistanceFunction, SquaredEuclideanDistanceFunction, SquaredPearsonCorrelationDistanceFunction, SquaredUncenteredCorrelationDistanceFunction, SubspaceEuclideanDistanceFunction, SubspaceLPNormDistanceFunction, SubspaceManhattanDistanceFunction, SubspaceMaximumDistanceFunction, UncenteredCorrelationDistanceFunction, WeightedCanberraDistanceFunction, WeightedEuclideanDistanceFunction, WeightedLPNormDistanceFunction, WeightedManhattanDistanceFunction, WeightedMaximumDistanceFunction, WeightedPearsonCorrelationDistanceFunction, WeightedSquaredEuclideanDistanceFunction, WeightedSquaredPearsonCorrelationDistanceFunction

    public interface NumberVectorDistanceFunction<O>
extends PrimitiveDistanceFunction<O>
    Base interface for the common case of distance functions defined on numerical vectors.
    Since:
    0.4.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double distance(NumberVector o1, NumberVector o2)
      Computes the distance between two given vectors according to this distance function.
